name: updateNetworkSwitchQosRule
description: Update a quality of service rule

dscp.description: DSCP tag that should be assigned to incoming packet. Set this to -1 to trust incoming DSCP. Default value is 0.

dstPort.description: The destination port of the incoming packet. Applicable only if protocol is TCP or UDP.

dstPortRange.description: The destination port range of the incoming packet. Applicable only if protocol is set to TCP or UDP. Example: 70-80

protocol.description: The protocol of the incoming packet. Can be one of "ANY", "TCP" or "UDP". Default value is "ANY".

srcPort.description: The source port of the incoming packet. Applicable only if protocol is TCP or UDP.

srcPortRange.description: The source port range of the incoming packet. Applicable only if protocol is set to TCP or UDP. Example: 70-80

vlan.description: The VLAN of the incoming packet. A null value will match any VLAN.
